articles.content: The tortuous conversion of Nick Scali chief executive Anthony Scali reached its next phase on Monday evening, when the furniture retailer agreed to return $3.6 million of JobKeeper to the Australian … [+2876 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Thompson, Anthony Macdonald, Tim Boyd
articles.title: Consulting behemoth McKinsey inks biggest-ever Aussie acquisition - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: It is learnt the New York-headquartered bigwig has snapped up Sydney-based digital consultancy firm Hypothesis.
articles.content:
The Hypothesis acquisition is also a sign that McKinsey is looking to get on the tools a bit more when it comes to digital consulting.
The global giant is best known for its strategic advice and get… [+1152 chars]
